common.transparency_desc: Transparency is our priority. Here you have all the legal information about who we are and the rules of this website.

avis_legal.title: Legal Notice
avis_legal.section1_desc: In compliance with Law 34/2002 (LSSI-CE), we inform that the owner of the website is:
avis_legal.section2_p1: Access to this website is free. Simple access does not imply any commercial relationship between DigitAI Studios and the user.
avis_legal.section2_p2: The user agrees to use the website in accordance with the law and this Legal Notice, refraining from using it for illegal purposes or those that may harm third-party interests.
avis_legal.section3_quote: All content (brands, logos, texts, photos, icons, images, etc.), as well as graphic design, source code, and software, are the exclusive property of DigitAI Studios or third parties that have authorized its use, protected by national and international legislation.
avis_legal.section4_p1: DigitAI Studios is not responsible for:
avis_legal.section4_list_1: Possible security failures or damages to the user‚Äôs computer system (viruses, malware, etc.).
avis_legal.section4_list_2: Information and content stored in forums, social networks, or other platforms allowing third-party content.
avis_legal.section4_list_3: The exact accuracy of automatic audits, which are indicative and based on the Google Lighthouse API.
avis_legal.section5_p1: Spanish law applies. Both parties expressly submit to the Courts of Girona.

privacitat.title: Privacy Policy
privacitat.subtitle: Your privacy is sacred. Here we clearly explain what data we collect, why, and how we protect it.
privacitat.section1_title: 1. Who is responsible for your data?
privacitat.section1_text: The controller is DigitAI Studios (see Legal Notice for full info). You can contact our Data Protection Officer at: dpd@digitaistudios.com.
privacitat.section2_desc: We only collect the data strictly necessary to offer our services:
privacitat.data_audit_desc: The URL you want to analyze and your email to send the report.
privacitat.data_account_desc: Your name, email, and encrypted password when registering.
privacitat.section3_title: 3. Who do we share the data with?
privacitat.section3_desc: We do not sell your data. We only share it with essential technological providers:
privacitat.provider_google: Google Cloud: API to process web audits.
privacitat.section4_p1: You have complete control over your data. You can:
privacitat.rights_list_1: Access, rectify, or delete your data.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: We use cookies to ensure correct website operation and understand how to improve it. Here are the details.
cookies.section1_quote: A cookie is a small text file stored in your browser when you visit most websites. Its purpose is to remember your visit, keep your session open, or save your preferences.
cookies.section2_p1: This site uses the following types of cookies:
cookies.tech_desc: Essential for the site to work. Without them, you cannot log in or browse correctly.
cookies.analytics_desc: Allow us to measure user count and analyze usage to improve the service.
cookies.analytics_1: In-house Analytics: Anonymous stats respecting privacy (no invasive Google tracking).
cookies.section3_p1: You can allow, block, or delete cookies via your browser settings:
